content:
att.anchoring

anchoring provides attributes for use on annotations, e.g. notes and groups of notes describing the existence and position of an anchor for annotations.
Moduletei â€” Declarations for classes, datatypes, and macros available to all TEI modules
Membersnote noteGrp
Attributes
@anchored
indicates whether the copy text shows the exact place of reference for the note.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.truthValue
@targetEnd
points to the end of the span to which the note is attached, if the note is not embedded in the text at that point.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.pointer
